title: Perturbative approach to the two-dimensional quantum gravity
abstract: The main part of this presentation is a review of the previous original works on the perturbative covariant approach to the $2$-dimensional quantum gravity. We discuss the renormalization of the two-dimensional dilaton gravity in a harmonic gauge, the form of the quantum corrections to the classical potential, and the conditions of Weyl invariance in a theory of string coupled to $2d$ quantum gravity.
